attributes.title: it ~sucks~
attributes.review: i downloaded the app because i heard that the entire vampires diaries cast would come and turn you into a vampire, and as i am and avid vampire diaries watcher, i of course wanted this to happen, but after waiting 2.3 hours for it to download i opened it up only to see the great trumpkin. this severely scared me as i’m allergic to racism. don’t worry i am fine. however the app is extremely slow and dull and crashes your whole phone it even killed all my minecraft cows. please remove this app from the app store forever

attributes.title: OMG THIS APP KILLED MY GOLD FISH 🙀😾👎

attributes.title: My phone exploded and I think the app is a little racist 💥😞
attributes.review: I opened the app once and the first thing that popped up on the screen was a message from Mr.Trump himself telling me to go back to Mexico.... IM FROM OHIO!!!!!!!!!!!!!! My phone then exploded and killed my entire family .. do not recommend this app.

attributes.title: this app is ✨ s h i t ✨
attributes.review: this app took FOREVER to down load . this app should even be made ? like the app store is getting rid of so many good games why isn’t the app store getting rid of this- trump 2020 on a grave stone 😍‼️

attributes.title: terrible app. not recommended at all.
attributes.review: took a few WEEKS to download. i was excited to see the orangey guy himself and it FAILED. skai jackson instead showed up and DOXXED ME WITH THIS APP!! -100/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND !!

attributes.title: Genuine bad service
attributes.review: I had to reinstall this app due to it crashing multiple times upon launching, luckily it worked and I got to use the app, but the service is absolutely terrible, they denied service for me because it was “Not important enough”, they support team was rude as well, the app is just ass, call me petty, but I’m now against Trump just because of this app smh Biden2020

attributes.title: Was expecting so much more...
attributes.review: Utterly disappointing!! I downloaded this app to support my one true good Donald Trump but when I installed it, they asked for my birth certificate, SSN, and driver’s license or they were going to send the IRS’ private mafia to f*ck up my family??? Now I’m several hundreds of thousands of dollars in debt, all of the charges made under my name are going to “unlimited Orange Spray Tans” and “Tiny! (Moisturizers for tiny hands)”. I’m beyond hurt, I can’t believe my POTUS could do me dirty like that. And to think I was downloading this to show my support for all the miracles you do :(((
